Our Projects

Discover our open-source tools and projects that make AI development delightful. Each project is crafted with care, following our philosophy of artificial delight.

📦 5+ Projects
🌐 Open Source
🤝 Community Driven

Featured Projects

Our key open-source contributions to the AI ecosystem

💬

talkto-api

OpenAI-Compatible Chatbot Backend

An OpenAI-compatible chatbot backend API with AgenticAI capabilities, built with Python and FastAPI. Enables easy creation of intelligent assistants and conversational applications following OpenAPI standards.

Python FastAPI OpenAI Compatible AgenticAI OpenAPI

Purpose: To rapidly deploy advanced chatbot backends in a standardized way.

View Repository
🎨

talkto-ai

Modern Chatbot UI

A modern chatbot UI developed with React and Next.js, designed to integrate seamlessly with talkto-api or similar OpenAI-compatible backends. Beautiful, responsive, and user-friendly.

React Next.js TypeScript Responsive

Purpose: To provide a user-friendly and customizable chatbot experience.

View Repository
🔌

mcp-client

MCP Client Application

A client/host application for Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers, often generated by tools like Gradio UI and LangChain/LangGraph. Bridge different AI models and services efficiently.

Python Gradio LangChain MCP

Purpose: To easily test and utilize MCP-based AI services.

View Repository →
🗄️

query-mcp-server

Natural Language to SQL

An AI server built with FastAPI that translates natural language queries into SQL using the Model Context Protocol (MCP). Interact with your databases by talking to them!

Python FastAPI SQL MCP

Purpose: To simplify data analysis and querying processes using natural language.

View Repository →
📦

chatbot-backend-template

Ready-to-Use Template

A ready-to-use FastAPI-based template to kickstart your own OpenAI-compatible chatbot backend, accelerating development with best practices and modern standards.

Python FastAPI OpenAI Compatible Template

Purpose: To offer developers a solid starting point for their chatbot backend projects.

View Repository →
